Description: Two pieces of an object of uncertain function: made of brown flint flaked on both sides and sharpened along the edges. Possibly it was originally a knife, the central part of the blade having been removed for some reason.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr Harry Reginald Holland Hall
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. Naville, ‘The cemeteries of Abydos’ I (London, 1913), 39, pl.XIV, 2.
